trans-unit.source: Enumerates display monitors (including invisible pseudo-monitors associated with the mirroring drivers)

seg-source.mrk: Enumerates display monitors (including invisible pseudo-monitors associated with the mirroring drivers)

target.mrk: Enumerates display monitors (including invisible pseudo-monitors associated with the mirroring drivers)

trans-unit.source: [optional] Handle to a display device context that defines the visible region of interest.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a display device context that defines the visible region of interest.

target.mrk: Handle to a display device context that defines the visible region of interest.

trans-unit.source: If it's 0 (Default), the visible region of interest is the virtual screen that encompasses all the displays on the desktop.

seg-source.mrk: If it's 0 (Default), the visible region of interest is the virtual screen that encompasses all the displays on the desktop.

target.mrk: If it's 0 (Default), the visible region of interest is the virtual screen that encompasses all the displays on the desktop.

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagRECT structure that specifies a clipping rectangle.

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure that specifies a clipping rectangle.

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure that specifies a clipping rectangle.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be 0 (Default) if you don't want to clip the specified region.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be 0 (Default) if you don't want to clip the specified region.

target.mrk: This parameter can be 0 (Default) if you don't want to clip the specified region.

trans-unit.source: The 2D array containing the following information:

seg-source.mrk: The 2D array containing the following information:

target.mrk: The 2D array containing the following information:

trans-unit.source: [n][0] - A handle to the display monitor.

seg-source.mrk: [n][0] - A handle to the display monitor.

target.mrk: [n][0] - A handle to the display monitor.

trans-unit.source: [n][1] - $tagRECT structure defining a display monitor rectangle or the clipping area.

seg-source.mrk: [n][1] - $tagRECT structure defining a display monitor rectangle or the clipping area.

target.mrk: [n][1] - $tagRECT structure defining a display monitor rectangle or the clipping area.
